unpublishedAction.name: getOrders

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT op.product_id,op.amount,op.price_unit,(op.amount*op.price_unit)as total,p.product_name, p.product_image
FROM public."order_product" op
INNER JOIN public."orders" o ON op.order_id = o.order_id
INNER JOIN public."products" p ON op.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.user_id = '{{appsmith.store.user.id}}' and o.status = '0';

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
